name: Reelin'
description:
Reelin'

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Collect Fish And Explore The Oceans Landscape And Characters In This Small Relaxing Island Hopping Adventure!!

May Take A Small While To Load

Here's A Small Game To Celebrate Newgrounds 2022 Pixel Day. I First Entered Pixel Day Last Year (2021) With My Game Guarden Alongside H*llWink;

This Game Is Pretty Relaxing So I Hope You Don't Fall Asleep

Enjoy The Game!!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

"WASD" - Movement

"Tab" - Open Menu

"Shift" - Sprint

"Mouse Wheel" - Zoom In/ Out

"E" - Interact

"Left Click" - Start/ Stop Fishing

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
